ygData.subject: RE: L46 weapon effectiveness.
ygData.msgSnippet: I used it when we weren t fighting casters, then I would substitute a rhythm song, up until I got Binding and Chains.  I now use those, Binding if using AoE
ygData.messageBody:
I used it when we weren't fighting casters, then I would substitute a rhythm
song, up until I got Binding and Chains. I now use those, Binding if using
AoE and runners are not a problem, Chains if it is. This way I figure I'm
giving the equivalent of a 30% haste to the entire group, rather than a 20%
haste to just myself.

Tomerrilin Loreweaver

-----Original Message-----
From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 10:44 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] L46 weapon effectiveness.


From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>

Oh ya,

I solo now (45, 46, 47) more than ever. More than I like to but I need the
xp. I keep it memmed for all my solo work.

Sylly

p.s. still kicking myself for not using it more over all those levels.
Warsong==20% haste; FBSS===20% haste <sheesh> Bards have built-in FBSS -
use it!
